issue.title: Update AtlasSimInterface as BDI evolves the robot control behaviors

content.raw:
Method 2:

Instead of using a separate ROS node as a bridge, which may introduce latency, and requires the use of ROS, link against a shim library that implements the same API as AtlasRobotInterface, but talks to simulation on the back end.

Kevin Knoedler kindly contributed his implementation of such a shim library, with permission for us to redistribute it with drcsim.  His code, slightly modified, is packaged in the `tutorials/atlas_interface` package on the `ari_bridge` branch.  To try it out, read the [README](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/15d096af09e56642d462f22b7038d02c020ce26b/tutorials/atlas_interface/README?at=ari_bridge).

Feedback welcome.
